primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To deposit funds via wire transfer on Ndax (mobile web):

  1. Log in at ndax.io.
  2. Tap the Ndax logo in the top-left corner.
  3. From the menu, select Wallet.
  4. Choose Canadian Dollar or United States Dollar from the list.
  5. Tap the green down arrow to start a deposit.
  6. Select Wire Transfer.
  7. Copy the wire transfer details provided.
  8. Send the wire transfer using your online banking platform or by visiting your bank branch.
  9. After sending the wire, scroll down and tap Upload a Receipt.
  10. Enter your full name and amount exactly as shown on the wire receipt.
  11. Tap Click here to select a file and upload a copy of the wire receipt.
  12. Tap Submit to complete the upload.

ðŸ’¡ Wire deposits are usually credited to your NDAX CAD wallet within 0â€“1 business day, as long as all information matches.
